sources.title: I Yam Love Sick (1938)
sources.description: Olive is reading a romance novel and munching on a gift box of candy from Bluto when Popeye drops by. She's too absorbed to notice him, so he feigns illness. The doctors are at a loss for a cure. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/i-yam-love-sick-1938/

metadata.Plot: Olive is reading a romance novel and munching on a gift box of candy from Bluto when Popeye drops by. She's too absorbed to notice him, so he feigns illness. The doctors are at a loss for a cure.
metadata.Actors: Bonnie Poe, Jack Mercer, Gus Wicke
